alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 1:25PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brazoria and northeastern Matagorda Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Columbia, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Angleton, West Columbia, Sweeny, Brazoria, Holiday Lakes, Bailey`s Prairie, Bonney, Van Vleck and Wild Peach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda
